properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northwest Blue Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 5 at 6:43AM PST until January 6 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...IMPACTFUL SNOW BEGINNING THIS EVENING AND CONTINUING THROUGH
MONDAY...

.Pacific moisture will overspread the Cascade Crest beginning this
afternoon. Several inches of snow will fall on Snoqualmie and
White Passes late tonight and through tomorrow. Snow
accumulations will be in feet on area mountains. Snow will begin
in the Blue Mtns tomorrow where 3-6 inches are expected.

* WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 9 inches. Winds will be breezy, up to 25mph.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult at times. Hazardous conditions
may impact Monday's commute on I-84 (Meacham area) and OR SR
204 (Tollgate area).
properties.instruction:
Tripcheck for information regarding road conditions. Slow down
and use caution if you must travel.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM PST MONDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET
